get.description: List all registered MCP servers.

schema.title: Response List Servers Api V1 Mcp Servers Get

get.description: Check health of a specific server.

List available tools, optionally filtered by server or query.

schema.title: Response List Tools Api V1 Mcp Tools Get

get.description: Get details of a specific tool.

post.description: Invoke a tool on a specific server.

Analyze a user message to determine if it requires Pentarchy voting.

This endpoint checks if the action described in the message:
- Has an estimated cost >= $50 (triggers voting)
- Has an estimated cost >= $100 (requires human review)
- Involves sensitive operations (security, legal, financial)

Automatically create a proposal if the message warrants Pentarchy voting.

This is called by the chat system when an action is detected that requires governance.

get.description: Get all pending proposals that are awaiting votes.
List all proposals with optional filtering.

schema.title: Response List Proposals Api V1 Votes Proposals Get

post.description: Create a new proposal and initiate Pentarchy voting.

get.description: Get details of a specific proposal.

post.description: Force resolution of a pending proposal.
Manually add a vote (for testing or override).

get.description: Get voting statistics.
Get voting thresholds for different risk levels.
Liveness endpoint for container health checks.
